subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury scored 38 points and Steve Francis had a season-high 26 points as the Knicks moved to a game behind the Nets for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: Stephon Marbury scored 38 points and Steve Francis had a season-high 26 points as the Knicks moved to a game behind the Nets for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference.
